title: august 16: harmonic convergence
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first ever globally coordinated mass meditation event, Harmonic Convergence, in 1987. After, Maia revisists the Ramones first public concert at the iconic CBGB music club in Manhattan. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
